title: Peckham Mix
overview: When Josh's fiancé leaves him for a new guy he finds himself shattered – and in need of a new place to live. He ends up moving in with Rex and Connor, a mysterious pair. He quickly becomes intrigued by their late-night excursions. Encouraged to live a little, he joins them on an outing – and the night proves more exciting that he could have imagined. Crime doesn't pay… but revenge does.
